title: Do u still call twitch's E expunge?
body:
Like when i'm playing in chat I refer to his E as expunge. "ops I expunged too early"
NOBODY LIKES CONTAMINATE :'(

replies.body:
No because I can never remember which one was the old name and which is the new name. 

His R will always be Spray and Pray to me though. Lux's R will also forever be Finales Funkeln in my heart.
Anyone ever slip up and call the chickens wraiths?

No, But i Still refer to red camp as Elder lizard all the time.
"Chickens" just kinda stuck for me. (>_>)
I call them wraiths 100% of the time. And the Krugs I still call golems

Now THAT is pretty old dated
{{champion:26}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:26}}
cause I liked the way it use to be! I played with those names for years, and then they just remove them for some ugly less humanoid rock monsters. Makes me feel nostalgic when I call them that xD

> [{quoted}](name=137434,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTQEixWe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-18T14:24:55.176+0000)
>
 Lux's R will also forever be Finales Funkeln in my heart.

Yes.
Never forget the atrocity that was Infinite Light.
Infinite light sounds more like lux ult can be shot across the map

Lux ult is based on a Touhou witch name Marisa something something
Neither,it is still the same
Maybe they change it because some people have trouble saying FunkeIn
And you insinuate his ult isn't spray and pray?
E is Expunge, and R is Spray and Pray. ADCs are not Marksmen, they're ADCs.
but Yasuo and Trynda are ADCs :(

>Yasuo and Trynda are ADCs

Tryndamere is a fighter, Yasuo is a tumor.
Wut u talkin' 'bout, dey both tumors.

Trynd's kit is grossly outdated, making it poorly designed in terms of today's standard which prompts the need for a rework. He was one of the first champions they made, and in all honesty can be excused for the most part since at the time of his creation, they were just throwing kits together for new releases not thinking about how these kits would age or interact with future releases. He can be fixed, which is why I made the distinction. Yasuo however, will only be fixed when Riot stops defending and glorifying his design, and admits his kit is atrocious.

Unlike Tryndamere, Yasuo has a modern kit but is so obnoxious, toxic, and horribly designed that there is no satisfactory excuse for its creation and approval. There is no reason something like Yasuo should ever be on the roster in this age of League, especially considering CertainlyT,~~ his~~ _its_ designer, spoke at PAX saying quote "We want to avoid creating frustration."  Keep in mind Kalista was also approved with this ideology in mind shortly after Yasuo's release... 

You definitely want to avoid creating frustration...for the people playing these repulsive, agonizing mistakes.

I didn't even know that E changed name '-'.

E is Expunge,  
R is spray and Pray,
Final Flash/Finales Funkeln is "Lux' ult"
Quinn's ult is still Tag Team.

They were too busy to figure out what to name her Q.

 meanwhile... Talon...
My brain is messed up now
"TAG TEAM" not "behind enemy lines" {{item:3070}}  {{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}

tag team implies valor is actually doing something.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}
Yeah, but he's not tagging in and out with Quinn anymore.
then it should be called 'Taxi' i guess

I mean, Contaminate makes more sense than Expunge (definition is to erase or remove completely, which implies that Expunge consumes stacks of his poison, which it doesn't) 

But yeah, I still find myself calling it Expunge. Spray-and-Pray too, but someone mentioned after his rework that it was changed to Rat-ta-tat-tat because it'd be hilarious to hear shoutcasters say it and I love that more.
I like to imagine Expunge means erase or remove my opponents.
"_They_ are the plague!"

expunge originally referred to violently ripping out the poison.

Contaminate makes no sense because it doesn't add infection. I've suggested a number of times that the e name should be fester or something. But I like expunge over contaminate anyway.
and contaminate is already the name of trundle's W.. awkward D:
I always thought that Twitch was dealing damage with his E by taking all his dirt back that he put on them.
Yes. His ult is also still spray n pray to me.
wait, you mean it isn't spray n pray anymore?
Contaminate makes no fucking sense for that skill.

Makes more sense than Expunge, though... Expunge means to erase or remove something unpleasant, which would imply it's removing his stacks or using them up, but it doesn't. Contaminate, however, means, to make something impure, by exposing it to an oft-poisonous substance. Contaminate makes a whole lot more sense than Expunge.

> [{quoted}](name=Ackelope,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTQEixWe,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-12-18T22:52:20.037+0000)
>
> Contaminate, however, means, to make something impure, by exposing it to an oft-poisonous substance.

And Twitch's E doesn't do that; that's his W.
I still call it Spray and Pray for R haha.
WHEN DID IT CHANGE!?!?

> [{quoted}](name=All Day Tay Tay,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTQEixWe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-18T14:12:06.627+0000)
>
> WHEN DID IT CHANGE!?!?

this
I didn't know it got a new name, so yes I still call it expunge.

Contaminate is a stupid name since just attacking applies the poison (which is what contaminate actually means). Some idiots at Riot trying really hard to justify the existence of their job ruined perfectly good names for Twitch's abilities.
Yup, and I still call it spray and pray.
Someone like ratatata ?  spray and pray guys..
I kinda like it better when he calls it "Pins and Needles" or "Sewer Skewers". I mean of the name it has now those make more sense. Sorry I wasn't here before Twitch's rework.
Yes joey, I know it's in the top 1%.
Yup, And I still call the Talisment Shurillia's
i just would say "oops i e'd too early"

:D as i red the title i really was like "how else would i name that?"

..surly not the best choice of name-changing riot has ever done.

It'll always be Expunge and always be Spray and Pray. Rat-Tat-Tat is a fuckin stupid name and I will never ever call it a such. I have no problem with Contaminate, I just think Expunge is better and I can't shake the habit.
trundle's E is still pillar of filth to me ; ; (doesn't help that I only ever play traditional trundle skin)
